item.title: Social Media Marketing Jobs – Recruiters & HR Professionals
item.description: Are you looking for work? Need to know what Recruiters and Agencies in London, UK are looking after Social Media Marketing? Then why not try my new Twitter List @damiensaunders/agencies-work-recruitment http://damiens.ws/davWziCurrently the list includes: Ecom Recruitment – recruitment agency Propel London – recruitment agency Stopgap – recruitment agency theSkein – freelance digital media jobs list October Recruitment London – recruitment agency Tanya @ October – Great Recruiter Want to get yourself added to the list – then just contact me.
